name: Slayer (itch)
description:
A LD43 game about sacrifice, walk through an ancient abandoned fortress to collect gear and kill enemies. Make sure that when the time comes to meet the ruler of this forgotten ruin that you have payed him enough respects. Or face his wrath.

WASD to move, mouse to swing sword (you need to swing your sword to do any damage), Right click to change active weapon, shift to open inventory and esc to exit menus.

Good luck.
